channel.title: Distorting delays
channel.description: Hi all, I'm having issues with distortion when using delays with a lot of feedback. After a little while, with FB on maximum, there's an unpleasant distortion. I thought at first that it might be some input noise but it happens even if I isolate the input after first playing a note or 2 in. It seems to happen with any type of audio delay I use. Any ideas? Here's a simple example..distortion delay.axp (5.3 KB)

item.title: Distorting delays
item.dc:creator: @Gaznesh gareth whittock
item.description:
@Gaznesh wrote:

Hi all, I'm having issues with distortion when using delays with a lot of feedback. After a little while, with FB on maximum, there's an unpleasant distortion. I thought at first that it might be some input noise but it happens even if I isolate the input after first playing a note or 2 in. It seems to happen with any type of audio delay I use. Any ideas?
